languages.text: "Конечно, я не допускал его к самому Осколку, а развернул лабораторию на Кетца Темер. Так было безопаснее. Все работали на мой план, но никто не владел достаточной информацией, чтобы понять его целиком".

"Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, я не допускал его к самому Осколку, а развернул лабораторию на Кетца Темер. Так было безопаснее. Все работали на мой план, но никто не владел достаточной информацией, чтобы понять его целиком".

traits.locale_text: "Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather deployed a laboratory on Quetza Temer. It was safer there." Everyone worked to fulfil my plan, but no one had enough information to fully comprehend it."

"Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather deployed a laboratory on Quetza Temer. It was safer there." Everyone worked to fulfil my plan, but no one had enough information to fully comprehend it."

"Of course, I didn't let him near the Shard itself, but rather deployed a laboratory on Quetza Temer. It was safer there. Everyone worked to fulfil my plan, but no one had enough information to fully comprehend it."

"Of course, I didn't let him near the Shard itself, but rather deployed a laboratory on Quetza Temer. It was safer there. Everyone worked to fulfil my plan, but no one had enough information to fully comprehend it."

"Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."

"Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."

languages.text: « Je ne l'ai pas laissé s'approcher directement de l'Écharde, bien entendu ; j'ai préféré installer un laboratoire sur Quetza Temer. C'était plus sûr. Tous les pions œuvraient pour accomplir mon plan, mais aucun n'avait assez d'informations pour le comprendre complètement. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne l'ai pas laissé approcher directement de l'Écharde, bien entendu ; j'ai préféré installer un laboratoire sur Quetza Temer. L'endroit était plus sûr. Tout le monde travaillait pour accomplir mon plan, mais personne n'avait assez d'informations pour le comprendre complètement. »

languages.text: «Por supuesto, no permití que se acercara al fragmento, sino que establecí un laboratorio para él en Quetza Temer. Eso era mucho más seguro. Todas las piezas estaban contribuyendo a mi plan, pero ninguna tenía información suficiente para comprenderlo en su totalidad».
languages.original_text: "Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto, no dejé que se acercara al propio fragmento, sino que le hice establecer un laboratorio en Quetza Temer. Era más seguro. Todo el mundo trabajaba en beneficio de mi plan, pero nadie tenía información suficiente para comprender su envergadura».

languages.text: “当然，我并没有允许那个血伶人靠近碎片本身，而是在格扎尔特默设立了一间实验室，因为这样更安全。这样一来，每个人都在努力完成我的计划，但没人能看到这个计划的全貌。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."

traits.locale_text: “当然，我并没有允许那个血伶人靠近碎片，而是在格扎尔特默部署了一间实验室，因为那里更安全。这样一来，每个人都在努力完成我的计划，但每个人也只能掌握一小部分情报，看不到这个计划的全貌。”

languages.text: "Natürlich habe ich ihn nicht in die Nähe des Splitters gelassen, sondern auf Quetza Temer ein Labor für ihn eingerichtet. So war es sicherer. Alle Teile haben zu meinem Plan beigetragen, doch niemand hatte genug Informationen, um ihn in seiner Gesamtheit zu verstehen."
languages.original_text: "Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich habe ich ihn nicht in die Nähe des Fragments gelassen, sondern ein Laboratorium auf Quetza Temer eingesetzt. Dort war es sicherer. Jeder hat an der Verwirklichung meines Plans mitgewirkt, doch niemand hatte genügend Informationen, um ihn vollständig zu verstehen."

languages.text: 「もちろん、彼をシャード自体には近づけさせはしなかったが、ケツァ・テメルに研究所を配備した。その方が安全だったからだ。誰もが私の計画を遂行するべく働いていたが、誰一人としてそれを完全に理解するのに十分な情報を持っていなかった」
languages.original_text: "Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、彼をシャード自体には近づけさせはしなかったが、ケツァ・テメルに研究所を配備した。その方が安全だったからだ。誰もが私の計画を遂行するべく働いていたが、誰一人としてそれを完全に理解するのに十分な情報を持っていなかった」

languages.text: "Tabii onu Parça'ya yaklaştırmadım. Quetza Temer'de ona bir laboratuvar kurdum. O şekilde daha güvenliydi. Tüm parçalar planıma katkı sağlıyordu ama hiçbiri planın tamamını idrak edecek kadar bilgiye sahip değildi."
languages.original_text: "Of course, I did not let him near the Shard itself, but rather set up a laboratory for him on Quetza Temer. It was safer that way. All the pieces were contributing to my plan, but none had enough information to comprehend the entirety of it."
